meanings.definition: A person or thing that arranges or organizes items into groups or categories.
meanings.sent1: The assorters at the library sorted the books by genre.
meanings.sent2: I bought a set of colorful assorters to organize my art supplies.
meanings.sent3: The assorters at the grocery store accidentally put the vegetables in the candy aisle!
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a team of assorters, neatly categorizing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The assorters in the factory worked tirelessly to pack the products efficiently.

meanings.definition: A machine or tool used for sorting or categorizing items.
meanings.sent1: The small business invested in high-tech assorters to speed up production.
meanings.sent2: The post office uses assorters to quickly sort letters by destination.
meanings.sent3: The assorters in the warehouse hummed happily as they organized the inventory.
meanings.sent4: The assorters in the kitchen drawer helped keep the utensils neatly arranged.
meanings.sent5: The assortment of assorters in the workshop made the task of sorting a breeze.
